thread.title: Dad's priceless reaction to son's Elsa Halloween costume goes...
thread.title_full: Dad's priceless reaction to son's Elsa Halloween costume goes... | www.palmbeachpost.com

author: Yolanda Arrington
title: Dad's priceless reaction to son's Elsa Halloween costume goes...
text:
Paul Henson is a young dad from Chesapeake, Virginia, who just wants to let his kid be a kid for as long as possible. He and his son, Caiden, started what could be the arduous process of Halloween costume shopping, but it seems Caiden is a little guy who knows what he wants. Caiden’s wish is to be Elsa from the Disney animated film “Frozen.” And, in good dad fashion, Henson is letting his son express himself.
>> RELATED: Watch this dad's reaction after his son picks out a doll at the toy store
Henson posted a photo from their shopping excursion to Facebook on Sunday. It’s been shared more than 25,000 times, with many commenters praising Henson for being an open-minded father.
When boy picks "Frozen" Elsa #Halloween costume, dad offers to dress up as her sister Anna http://t.co/Zdnt4prXyE pic.twitter.com/gAPiVJfo7w
— Yahoo (@Yahoo) October 8, 2015 >> Read more trending stories
In the viral post, Henson wrote, " Anyone that knows us, knows we generally let Caiden make his own choices, to an extent. Well, he has decided on a Halloween costume. He wants to be Elsa. He also wants me to be Anna. Game on."
He added, "Halloween is about children pretending to be their favorite characters. Just so happens, this week his is a princess."
